com.sap.vocabularies.HTML5.v1.@Core.LongDescription: The HTML5 vocabulary provides rendering hints for HTML5 clients

CssDefaults.@Core.Description: CSS definitions that may be used as defaults
CssDefaults.@Core.LongDescription: This term can applied to e.g. UI.DataFieldAbstract records

width.@Core.LongDescription:
The property allows all values specified for the original css width property.
              Note that clients consuming this annotation may only support selected length units.
